content:
from .contact import load_contact
from .hotreload import load_hotreload
from .login import load_login
from .messages import load_messages
from .register import load_register

def load_components(core):
    load_contact(core)
    load_hotreload(core)
    load_login(core)
    load_messages(core)
    load_register(core)
description: A complete and graceful API for Wechat. 微信个人号接口、微信机器人及命令行微信，三十行即可自定义个人号机器人。
